properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 4:56AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Snow showers. Brief moderate to heavy snow is possible
with visibility reduced to around a half mile. New snowfall of
1 to 2 inches, especially where heavier snow showers occur.

* WHERE...Central and southern Johnson County including Kaycee.

* WHEN...Today.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will be slick to snow covered. The
morning and evening commute will be impacted by winter weather.

NWSheadline: Snow at times Today across Southern Johnson County
